keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Greens stand for fairer taxes, decent pensions, jobs and action for a low carbon economy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Greens came second at the last council elections in York Central, ahead of the Tories and Lib Dems.

issues.economy: The Greens stand for...action for a low carbon economy.

leaflet.personalStatement: Andy Chase has lived in the constituency for 20 years and has a record of action as a community campaigner.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Other parties have put out leaflets in some areas claiming that a Green vote is 'wasted' - if the Greens are not a factor in this election, why all the fuss?
